comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Thanks Mr Hall for the date - Saturday 28 January 1899. It was the Intercolonial Sailing Carnival, and VERA was sailing for Queensland according to the SMH - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14197584 It seems that VERA "did not start" - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14197630 . She looks fine in this photo ...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Hmm yes she does look ok in this image, if a little overcrowded!
